sentence: The SPDR S&P Homebuilders ETF (NYSEArca: XHB) fell nearly 1% last week amid fears that Amazon.com Inc. ( AMZN ) could encroach upon the home appliance market currently dominated by the likes of Dow component Home Depot ( HD ) and Lowe's Companies Inc. ( LOW ).
